p: It should be emphasized that in vitro nature of the present study and other similar studies is some of the limitations here. In this context, the clinical use of EO in mouth rinses is associated with some complex issues. Based on the results of a study by Mohtashami et al., the concentrations of ingredients of EOs do not remain unchanged when they are stored under different conditions, with an increase in the concentration of carvacrol and a decrease in the concentration of ingredients with a low boiling point.[ 46]
